body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, March 17: 1865.

II... A military Court Martial is hereby ordered to convene at Frankfort on this 17: day of March 1865, or as soon thereafter as practicable for the purpose of investigation and trial of such prisoners as may be brought before them.

The following Officers are hereby detailed and will constitute said Court Martial
Lt. Col. J. J. Craddock
Major C. W. Quiggens
" A. J. Harrington Judge Advocate
No other Officers than those named can be assembled without manifest injury to the service --

DW Lindsey
Adjutant General of Kentucky
